definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: Why on earth have Man Booker's publicists chosen the Groucho?
sentences.chinese: 布克奖的那些公关为什么会选择格劳乔这个鬼地方？

sentences.english: Since then, horses have only been used for ceremonial events or public relations.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，马就只用于庆典或公关场合了。
销售及市场学，公关，服务业。

sentences.english: Would the P.R. team be willing to say what the problem is?
sentences.chinese: 公关团队会告诉我问题核心在哪儿吗？

sentences.english: Until then, its PR representatives are in a tough spot.
sentences.chinese: 但在此之前，三星公司的公关代表都会如坐针毡。

sentences.english: They are professional quotes-deleted corporations and individuals, who call themselves " Online PR".
sentences.chinese: 他们是专业的删帖公司和个人，自称“网络公关”。

sentences.english: Public relations representative at Guangzhou Holiday Inn.
sentences.chinese: 广州假日酒店公关代表。

sentences.english: RIM's reply was one of the most hamfisted PR moves in recent memory.
sentences.chinese: RIM的回应堪称近来最糟糕的公关行为之一。

sentences.english: Terence Zeng has rich cross-industry PR communication experiences.
sentences.chinese: 曾建明具有丰富的跨行业公关传播经验。

sentences.english: Since then, I have a love-hate relationship with PR.
sentences.chinese: 从此以后，我对公关爱恨交加。

sentences.english: Leggat has more than 28 years of communications and leadership experience.
sentences.chinese: 雷戎先生拥有长达28年的公关从业和管理经验。

sentences.english: There 's More to Google Beefs Than Google PR ?
sentences.chinese: 还有的更谷歌肉牛比谷歌公关？

sentences.english: Welcome to Ouran High School HostClub…
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临樱兰高校男公关部。

sentences.english: I hire a public relations person to publicize the fact that I work from home. P. 7
sentences.chinese: 我雇了一名公关人员，向公众宣布，我是在家工作的。

sentences.english: The promotion department drummed up obvious stunts.
sentences.chinese: 公关宣传部门显然耍起了引人注目的花招。

sentences.english: Represents the department in the absence of the Marcom Manager.
sentences.chinese: 在市场公关部经理缺席时代行其职责。

definition: to boost support or interest/to campaign/to promote
to discredit/to defame/to smear sb's name/to bring shame upon (oneself or one's family etc)/to blacken (e.g. commando's face for camouflage)/to black out or obliterate (e.g. censored words)
clear (of liquid)/limpid/to clarify/to make sth clear/to be clear (about the facts)
to settle (of liquid)/to become clear (by precipitation of impurities)/precipitate (chemistry)/to put in order/to quell disturbances
(Internet slang) to shift the blame/to pass the buck
Toutiao, personalized content recommendation app (abbr. for 今日頭條|今日头条[Jin1 ri4 Tou2 tiao2])
